Lyric:
[00:01.900]
[00:05.760]I might never be your knight in shining armor
[00:10.540]I might never be the one you take home to mother
[00:15.230]And I might never be the one who brings you flowers
[00:20.060]But I can be the one be the one tonight
[00:24.560]When I first saw you
[00:26.990]From across the room
[00:29.690]I could tell that you were curious
[00:32.950]Oh yeah
[00:34.350]Girl I hope you're sure
[00:36.330]What you're looking for
[00:39.190]'Cause I'm not good at making promises
[00:42.580]But if you like causing trouble up in hotel rooms
[00:47.400]And if you like having secret little rendezvous
[00:52.410]If you like to do the things you know that we shouldn't do
[00:57.260]Baby I'm perfect
[00:59.640]Baby I'm perfect for you
[01:01.730]And if you like midnight driving with the windows down
[01:06.620]And if you like going places we can't even pronounce
